SchemaForm 表单

对 Ant-design-vue form 组件的封装，使用前了解 ant-design-vue 的 form 组件。

基础用法

表单的基础用法展示。

标题

请输入自动完成输入框
请选择下拉选择框
请选择树选择框
parent 1
请选择级联选择
请选择台账日期
分隔线
<template>
  <it-schema-form
    :initValues="formData"
    :labelWidth="120"
    :baseColProps="{
      span: 24
    }"
    :actionItemOptions="{
      wrapperCol: {
        style: {
          paddingLeft: '120px'
        }
      }
    }"
    :actionColOptions="{
      span: 24
    }"
    :schemas="schemas"
    :submitOnReset="true"
    @submit="onSubmit"
    @reset="onReset"
  />
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        formData: {},
        schemas: [
          {
            prop: 'H3',
            label: '标题',
            component: 'H3'
          },
          {
            prop: 'input',
            label: '输入框',
            component: 'Input'
          },
          {
            prop: 'inputPassword',
            label: '密码输入框',
            component: 'InputPassword'
          },
          {
            prop: 'inputSearch',
            label: '搜索输入框',
            component: 'InputSearch'
          },
          {
            prop: 'inputTextArea',
            label: '文本域输入框',
            component: 'InputTextArea'
          },
          {
            prop: 'InputNumber',
            label: '数字输入框',
            component: 'InputNumber',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'autoComplete',
            label: '自动完成输入框',
            component: 'AutoComplete'
          },
          {
            prop: 'select',
            label: '下拉选择框',
            component: 'Select',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'treeSelect',
            label: '树选择框',
            component: 'TreeSelect',
            componentProps: {
              treeData: [
                {
                  title: 'parent 1',
                  value: 'parent 1',
                  children: [
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-0',
                      value: 'parent 1-0',
                      children: [
                        {
                          title: 'my leaf',
                          value: 'leaf1'
                        },
                        {
                          title: 'your leaf',
                          value: 'leaf2'
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-1',
                      value: 'parent 1-1'
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'tree',
            label: '树形控件',
            component: 'Tree',
            componentProps: {
              checkable: true,
              treeData: [
                {
                  title: 'parent 1',
                  key: '0-0',
                  children: [
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-0',
                      key: '0-0-0',
                      disabled: true,
                      children: [
                        { title: 'leaf', key: '0-0-0-0', disableCheckbox: true },
                        { title: 'leaf', key: '0-0-0-1' }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-1',
                      key: '0-0-1',
                      children: [{ key: '0-0-1-0', title: 'sss' }]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'switch',
            label: '开关',
            component: 'Switch'
          },
          {
            prop: 'radioGroup',
            label: '单选框',
            component: 'RadioGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                },
                {
                  label: '选项三',
                  value: 3
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'checkboxGroup',
            label: '复选框',
            component: 'CheckboxGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                },
                {
                  label: '选项三',
                  value: 3
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'cascader',
            label: '级联选择',
            component: 'Cascader',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '上海',
                  value: 'shanghai',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'shixiaqu',
                      label: '市辖区',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'pudong',
                          label: '浦东新区',
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'zhejiang',
                  label: '浙江',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'hangzhou',
                      label: '杭州',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'yuhang',
                          label: '余杭区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'jiangsu',
                  label: '江苏',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'nanjing',
                      label: '南京',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'qinhuai',
                          label: '秦淮区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'slider',
            label: '区间选择',
            component: 'Slider'
          },
          {
            prop: 'rate',
            label: '评分',
            component: 'Rate',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                margin: '-2px 0 0 -10px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'datePicker',
            label: '日期选择',
            component: 'DatePicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'monthPicker',
            label: '月份选择',
            component: 'MonthPicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'rangePicker',
            label: '时间范围选择',
            component: 'RangePicker'
          },
          {
            prop: 'weekPicker',
            label: '周选择',
            component: 'WeekPicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'timePicker',
            label: '时间选择',
            component: 'TimePicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'traceDataSelect',
            label: '台账日期',
            component: 'TraceDataSelect'
          },
          {
            prop: 'Divider',
            label: '分隔线',
            component: 'Divider'
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(values) {
        console.log('submit:', values)
      },
      onReset(values) {
        console.log('reset:', values)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
显示代码
复制代码片段

动态获取数据

<template>
  <it-schema-form
    :initValues="formData"
    :labelWidth="120"
    :baseColProps="{
      span: 24
    }"
    :actionItemOptions="{
      wrapperCol: {
        style: {
          paddingLeft: '120px'
        }
      }
    }"
    :showResetButton="false"
    :schemas="schemas"
    @submit="onSubmit"
  />
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        formData: {},
        schemas: [
          {
            prop: 'select',
            label: '下拉选择框',
            component: 'Select',
            componentProps: {
              request: () => {
                return new Promise(resolve => {
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    resolve([
                      {
                        label: '选项一',
                        value: 1
                      },
                      {
                        label: '选项二',
                        value: 2
                      },
                      {
                        label: '选项三',
                        value: 3
                      }
                    ])
                  }, 300)
                })
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'treeSelect',
            label: '树选择框',
            component: 'TreeSelect',
            componentProps: {
              request: () => {
                return new Promise(resolve => {
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    resolve([
                      {
                        title: 'parent 1',
                        value: 'parent 1',
                        children: [
                          {
                            title: 'parent 1-0',
                            value: 'parent 1-0',
                            children: [
                              {
                                title: 'my leaf',
                                value: 'leaf1'
                              },
                              {
                                title: 'your leaf',
                                value: 'leaf2'
                              }
                            ]
                          },
                          {
                            title: 'parent 1-1',
                            value: 'parent 1-1'
                          }
                        ]
                      }
                    ])
                  }, 300)
                })
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'tree',
            label: '树形控件',
            component: 'Tree',
            componentProps: {
              checkable: true,
              request: () => {
                return new Promise(resolve => {
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    resolve([
                      {
                        title: 'parent 1',
                        key: '0-0',
                        children: [
                          {
                            title: 'parent 1-0',
                            key: '0-0-0',
                            disabled: true,
                            children: [
                              { title: 'leaf', key: '0-0-0-0', disableCheckbox: true },
                              { title: 'leaf', key: '0-0-0-1' }
                            ]
                          },
                          {
                            title: 'parent 1-1',
                            key: '0-0-1',
                            children: [{ key: '0-0-1-0', title: 'sss' }]
                          }
                        ]
                      }
                    ])
                  }, 300)
                })
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'radioGroup',
            label: '单选框',
            component: 'RadioGroup',
            componentProps: {
              request: () => {
                return new Promise(resolve => {
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    resolve([
                      {
                        label: '选项一',
                        value: 1
                      },
                      {
                        label: '选项二',
                        value: 2
                      },
                      {
                        label: '选项三',
                        value: 3
                      }
                    ])
                  }, 300)
                })
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'checkboxGroup',
            label: '复选框',
            component: 'CheckboxGroup',
            componentProps: {
              request: () => {
                return new Promise(resolve => {
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    resolve([
                      {
                        label: '选项一',
                        value: 1
                      },
                      {
                        label: '选项二',
                        value: 2
                      },
                      {
                        label: '选项三',
                        value: 3
                      }
                    ])
                  }, 300)
                })
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'cascader',
            label: '级联选择',
            component: 'Cascader',
            componentProps: {
              request: () => {
                return new Promise(resolve => {
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    resolve([
                      {
                        label: '上海',
                        value: 'shanghai',
                        children: [
                          {
                            value: 'shixiaqu',
                            label: '市辖区',
                            children: [
                              {
                                value: 'pudong',
                                label: '浦东新区',
                              }
                            ]
                          }
                        ]
                      },
                      {
                        value: 'zhejiang',
                        label: '浙江',
                        children: [
                          {
                            value: 'hangzhou',
                            label: '杭州',
                            children: [
                              {
                                value: 'yuhang',
                                label: '余杭区'
                              }
                            ]
                          }
                        ]
                      },
                      {
                        value: 'jiangsu',
                        label: '江苏',
                        children: [
                          {
                            value: 'nanjing',
                            label: '南京',
                            children: [
                              {
                                value: 'qinhuai',
                                label: '秦淮区'
                              }
                            ]
                          }
                        ]
                      }
                    ])
                  }, 300)
                })
              }
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(values) {
        console.log('submit:', values)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
显示代码
复制代码片段

表单验证

支持添加校验规则。

请选择下拉选择框
请选择级联选择
<template>
  <it-schema-form
    :initValues="formData"
    :labelWidth="120"
    :baseColProps="{
      span: 24
    }"
    :actionItemOptions="{
      wrapperCol: {
        style: {
          paddingLeft: '120px'
        }
      }
    }"
    :showResetButton="false"
    :schemas="schemas"
    @submit="onSubmit"
  />
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        formData: {},
        schemas: [
          {
            prop: 'input',
            label: '输入框',
            component: 'Input',
            rules: [{required: true}]
          },
          {
            prop: 'inputTextArea',
            label: '文本域输入框',
            component: 'InputTextArea',
            rules: [{required: true}]
          },
          {
            prop: 'InputNumber',
            label: '数字输入框',
            component: 'InputNumber',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            },
            rules: [{required: true}]
          },
          {
            prop: 'select',
            label: '下拉选择框',
            component: 'Select',
            rules: [{required: true}]
          },
          {
            prop: 'radioGroup',
            label: '单选框',
            component: 'RadioGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                },
                {
                  label: '选项三',
                  value: 3
                }
              ]
            },
            rules: [{required: true}]
          },
          {
            prop: 'checkboxGroup',
            label: '复选框',
            component: 'CheckboxGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                },
                {
                  label: '选项三',
                  value: 3
                }
              ]
            },
            rules: [{required: true}]
          },
          {
            prop: 'cascader',
            label: '级联选择',
            component: 'Cascader',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '上海',
                  value: 'shanghai',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'shixiaqu',
                      label: '市辖区',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'pudong',
                          label: '浦东新区',
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'zhejiang',
                  label: '浙江',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'hangzhou',
                      label: '杭州',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'yuhang',
                          label: '余杭区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'jiangsu',
                  label: '江苏',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'nanjing',
                      label: '南京',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'qinhuai',
                          label: '秦淮区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            },
            rules: [{required: true}]
          },
          {
            prop: 'datePicker',
            label: '日期选择',
            component: 'DatePicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            },
            rules: [{required: true}]
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(values) {
        console.log(values)
      }
    }
  }
</script>

自定义表单控件

支持引入自定义表单控件。

请选择下拉选择框
<template>
  <it-schema-form
    :initValues="formData"
    :labelWidth="120"
    :baseColProps="{
      span: 24
    }"
    :actionItemOptions="{
      wrapperCol: {
        style: {
          paddingLeft: '120px'
        }
      }
    }"
    :showResetButton="false"
    :schemas="schemas"
    @submit="onSubmit"
  />
</template>

<script>
  // 引入自定义表单控件组件，vitepress 暂不支持 md 代码块引入组件，先注释
  /* import TraceDataSelect form '@/components/TraceDataSelect' */

  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        formData: {},
        schemas: [
          {
            prop: 'input',
            label: '输入框',
            component: 'Input'
          },
          {
            prop: 'select',
            label: '下拉选择框',
            component: 'Select'
          },
          // {
          //   prop: 'traceDataSelect',
          //   label: '台账日期',
          //   component: TraceDataSelect
          // }
        ]
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(values) {
        console.log(values)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
显示代码
复制代码片段

查看表单

设置 noStyle 属性为 true，开启纯文本展示表单。

标题

test input
test password
test inputSearch
test inputTextArea
100
test autoComplete
选项一
parent 1-1
0-0-1-00-0-10-0
选项二
选项二，选项三
shanghaishixiaqupudong
10
4
分隔线
2022-12-13 14:47:44
2022-05-13 14:47:47
2022-12-05 14:47:28-2023-01-17 14:47:28
2022-12-14 14:47:54
2022-12-13 14:47:59
2022-12-31
<template>
  <it-schema-form
    :initValues="formData"
    :labelWidth="120"
    labelAlign="left"
    :baseColProps="{
      span: 24
    }"
    :showActionButtonGroup="false"
    :noStyle="true"
    :schemas="schemas"
  />
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        formData: {
          input: 'test input',
          inputPassword: 'test password',
          inputSearch: 'test inputSearch',
          inputTextArea: 'test \n inputTextArea',
          InputNumber: '100',
          autoComplete: 'test autoComplete',
          select: 1,
          treeSelect: 'parent 1-1',
          tree: ['0-0-1-0', '0-0-1', '0-0'],
          switch: true,
          radioGroup: 2,
          checkboxGroup: [2, 3],
          cascader: ['shanghai', 'shixiaqu', 'pudong'],
          slider: 10,
          rate: 4,
          datePicker: '2022-12-13 14:47:44',
          monthPicker: '2022-05-13 14:47:47',
          rangePicker: ['2022-12-05 14:47:28', '2023-01-17 14:47:28'],
          weekPicker: '2022-12-14 14:47:54',
          timePicker: '2022-12-13 14:47:59',
          traceDataSelect: '2022-12-31'
        },
        schemas: [
          {
            prop: 'H3',
            label: '标题',
            component: 'H3'
          },
          {
            prop: 'input',
            label: '输入框',
            component: 'Input'
          },
          {
            prop: 'inputPassword',
            label: '密码输入框',
            component: 'InputPassword'
          },
          {
            prop: 'inputSearch',
            label: '搜索输入框',
            component: 'InputSearch'
          },
          {
            prop: 'inputTextArea',
            label: '文本域输入框',
            component: 'InputTextArea'
          },
          {
            prop: 'InputNumber',
            label: '数字输入框',
            component: 'InputNumber',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'autoComplete',
            label: '自动完成输入框',
            component: 'AutoComplete'
          },
          {
            prop: 'select',
            label: '下拉选择框',
            component: 'Select',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'treeSelect',
            label: '树选择框',
            component: 'TreeSelect',
            componentProps: {
              treeData: [
                {
                  title: 'parent 1',
                  value: 'parent 1',
                  children: [
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-0',
                      value: 'parent 1-0',
                      children: [
                        {
                          title: 'my leaf',
                          value: 'leaf1'
                        },
                        {
                          title: 'your leaf',
                          value: 'leaf2'
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-1',
                      value: 'parent 1-1'
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'tree',
            label: '树形控件',
            component: 'Tree',
            componentProps: {
              checkable: true,
              treeData: [
                {
                  title: 'parent 1',
                  key: '0-0',
                  children: [
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-0',
                      key: '0-0-0',
                      disabled: true,
                      children: [
                        { title: 'leaf', key: '0-0-0-0', disableCheckbox: true },
                        { title: 'leaf', key: '0-0-0-1' }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      title: 'parent 1-1',
                      key: '0-0-1',
                      children: [{ key: '0-0-1-0', title: 'sss' }]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'switch',
            label: '开关',
            component: 'Switch'
          },
          {
            prop: 'radioGroup',
            label: '单选框',
            component: 'RadioGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                },
                {
                  label: '选项三',
                  value: 3
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'checkboxGroup',
            label: '复选框',
            component: 'CheckboxGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                },
                {
                  label: '选项三',
                  value: 3
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'cascader',
            label: '级联选择',
            component: 'Cascader',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '上海',
                  value: 'shanghai',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'shixiaqu',
                      label: '市辖区',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'pudong',
                          label: '浦东新区',
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'zhejiang',
                  label: '浙江',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'hangzhou',
                      label: '杭州',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'yuhang',
                          label: '余杭区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'jiangsu',
                  label: '江苏',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'nanjing',
                      label: '南京',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'qinhuai',
                          label: '秦淮区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'slider',
            label: '区间选择',
            component: 'Slider'
          },
          {
            prop: 'rate',
            label: '评分',
            component: 'Rate',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                margin: '-2px 0 0 -10px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'Divider',
            label: '分隔线',
            component: 'Divider'
          },
          {
            prop: 'datePicker',
            label: '日期选择',
            component: 'DatePicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'monthPicker',
            label: '月份选择',
            component: 'MonthPicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'rangePicker',
            label: '时间范围选择',
            component: 'RangePicker'
          },
          {
            prop: 'weekPicker',
            label: '周选择',
            component: 'WeekPicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'timePicker',
            label: '时间选择',
            component: 'TimePicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '160px'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'traceDataSelect',
            label: '台账日期',
            component: 'TraceDataSelect'
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(values) {
        console.log('submit:', values)
      },
      onReset(values) {
        console.log('reset:', values)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
显示代码
复制代码片段

参数

ant-design-vue 的 Form Attributes 全部可用，这里列举新添加字段

参数说明必传类型回调参数默认值
isCard是否以卡片样式展示否Boolean-true
initValues表单字段初始值是Object-{}
schemas表单项配置，具体配置参数看下方 Form Schema Attributes是Array-[]
labelWidthlabel 标签宽度否Number | String--
fieldMapToTimeRangeTime 格式处理否Array-[]
fieldMapToObjectObject 数据格式处理否Array-[]
fieldMapToArrayArray 数据格式处理否Array-[]
transformDateFunc转化时间否Function-date.format.('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss')
mergeDynamicData表单项动态数据否Object | Array--
baseRowStyle栅栏 Row 样式否Object--
rowProps栅栏 Row 配置否Object--
baseColProps栅栏 Col 配置否Object--
submitOnReset点击重置按钮时提交表单否Boolean--
showActionButtonGroup显示操作按钮否Boolean-true
showSubmitButton显示确认按钮否Boolean-true
showResetButton显示重置按钮否Boolean-true
actionColOptions操作列 Col 配置否Object--
actionItemOptions操作列 formItem 配置否Object--
submitButtonOptions确认按钮配置，antd 按钮属性均支持，另外权限控制添加 auth 属性否Object--
resetButtonOptions重置按钮配置否Object--
submitFunc自定义确认函数否Function--
resetFunc自定义重置函数否Function--
disabled禁用表单否Boolean--
noStyle纯文本展示表单，用于仅需要查看数据的场景 ｜ 否 ｜ Boolean--
showAdvancedButton显示展开收起按钮否Boolean--
autoAdvancedLine超过 n 行折叠否Number-3
alwaysShowLines不受折叠影响的行数否Number-1

Form Schema Attributes

ant-design-vue 的 Form Item Attributes 和 表单控件 Attributes 全部可用，这里列举新添加字段

参数说明必传类型回调参数默认值
prop字段名是String--
viewProp查看字段名，noStyle = true 时有效，不传默认取 prop否String--
valueFieldvModel 绑定的字段名，默认 value否String--
component表单项对应的组件是String | component--
componentProps组件属性配置是ComponentProps--
componentSlots组件 slots否Object | String | Component | Function--
labellabel 文本是String--
subLabel子 label否String--
helpMessage帮助提示否String | String[] | Function--
helpComponentProps帮助组件属性配置，具体配置参数看下方 Help Attributes否String | String[] | Function--
labelWidthlabel 宽度否String | Number--
disabledLabelWidth禁用全局 labelWidth否Boolean--
loading组件加载状态否Boolean--
colProps栅栏 Col 配置否Object--
defaultValue初始值否any--
isAdvanced是否收起否Boolean--
vShow是否显示，作用同 v-show否Boolean--
hidden不展示此 form-item否Boolean--
slot自定义渲染 col 内容需要外层包装 form-item否Function--
dynamicNoStyle动态纯文本展示否Boolean | Function--
dynamicDisabled动态禁用否Boolean | Function--
dynamicRules动态校验规则否() => Rule[]--

Help Attributes

参数说明必传类型默认值
maxWidth最大宽度限制否String600px
showIndex多行显示序号否Boolean-
color气泡文本颜色否String#fff
fontSize气泡文本字体大小否String-
placement气泡位置否Stringright
text气泡文本是Array | String-

事件

参数说明回调参数
submit提交表单时触发Function(values)
reset重置表单时触发Function(formModel)

方法

ant-design-vue 的 Form Methods 全部可用，这里列举新增的方法

方法名说明参数
setFormModel设置某个字段的值prop, value
setSchemaFormProps设置表单属性formProps
handleFormValues处理表单值values
initFormValues初始化表单数据-
